questions.question_text:
What are two tasks that can be performed by using the Computer Vision service? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.A: Train a custom image classification model.
choices.D: Translate the text in an image between languages.

discussion.content: BC is correct

BC correct as given.
---------------
Microsoft Azure provides multiple cognitive services that you can use to detect and analyze faces, including:

 **Computer Vision, which offers face detection and some basic face analysis, such as determining age.
 **Video Indexer, which you can use to detect and identify faces in a video.
 **Face, which offers pre-built algorithms that can detect, recognize, and analyze faces.

Of these, Face offers the widest range of facial analysis capabilities, so we'll focus on that service in this module.

------------------
The ability to extract text from images is handled by the Computer Vision service, which also provides image analysis capabilities.
The Computer Vision service provides two application programming interfaces (APIs) that you can use to read text in images: the OCR API and the Read API.

The easiest way I have found, to differentiate between the cases is:
Regression: "How" (Predicting "How many", "How much") quantifying a numerical output.
Classification: "Either or" (Predicting which class something falls under) labels available.
Clustering: "Groups/Grouping" (Grouping according to features) labels unavailable.
BECAUSE the grouping of image is base in their colour ( in advance known parameter ) it's a classification , Cluster is base in unknow parameter or feauture

What are two tasks that can be performed by using computer vision? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: B&C are correct answers

Detech Color scheme and Brand images are correct based on

Detect the color scheme
Analyze color usage within an image. Computer Vision can determine whether an image is black & white or color and, for color images, identify the dominant and accent colors. Detect the color scheme

and 

Azure's Computer Vision service gives you access to advanced algorithms that process images and return information based on the visual features you're interested in. For example, Computer Vision can determine whether an image contains adult content, find specific brands or objects, or find human faces.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-in/learn/modules/analyze-images-computer-vision/2-image-analysis-azure

Detecting brands
This feature provides the ability to identify commercial brands. The service has an existing database of thousands of globally recognized logos from commercial brands of products

Additional capabilities
In addition to these capabilities, the Computer Vision service can:

Detect image types - for example, identifying clip art images or line drawings.
Detect image color schemes - specifically, identifying the dominant foreground, background, and overall colors in an image.
Generate thumbnails - creating small versions of images.
Moderate content - detecting images that contain adult content or depict violent, gory scenes.

B(https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/computer-vision/overview#detect-brands)

questions.question_text:
You need to build an image tagging solution for social media that tags images of your friends automatically.
Which Azure Cognitive Services service should you use?

discussion.content: More aligned towards face

Selected Answer: D
Key word is "image tagging".
Source: https://learn.fotoware.com/On-Premises/Color_Factory/Color_Factory_Reference_Guide/Managing_Metadata/Automatic_tagging_using_Azure_Computer_Vision_image_recognition

Selected Answer: A
Models in the Computer Vision are trained by MS and are ready to use without any customization. The question said that you need to tag images of "your friends". So that "A" should be correct.

Selected Answer: D
he Azure Cognitive Services service that should be used to build an image tagging solution for social media that tags images of your friends automatically is Computer Vision

Selected Answer: A
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/what-are-ai-services#available-azure-ai-services

Selected Answer: A
I think FACE is a better choice because it is a specific task of tagging friends and FACE is specifically designed for human face recognition and analysis, including identifying people in photos. Computer vision is intended for general image analysis and would be less accurate. I think FACE is the best choice.

Face is the correct answer , computer vision is pre-built model
In order to detect your friends face you should 
Face Detection and Recognition: It can accurately detect faces within an image and recognize individuals.   
Person Identification: If you have a database of your friends' faces, the service can identify them in new photos.
Customization: You can train the service to recognize specific individuals, improving accuracy over time.
Integration: It can be integrated into various applications and platforms.

Selected Answer: D
The key is "image tagging" not "face". From copilot:
For automating image tagging in social media, specifically targeting images of your friends, the ideal Azure Cognitive Services solution would be Computer Vision. This service can extract a wide variety of visual features from images, including content tags for recognizable objects, living beings, scenery, and actions. It’s not limited to just the main subject (such as a person in the foreground) but also includes settings (indoor or outdoor), furniture, tools, plants, animals, accessories, and more.

Selected Answer: D
Image Tagging = Computer Vision

Selected Answer: A
Answer A

Selected Answer: A
Face The Face service provides AI algorithms that detect, recognize, and analyze human faces in images. Facial recognition software is important in many different scenarios, such as identification, touchless access control, and face blurring for privacy. Follow the Face quickstart to get started.
FACE is more specific service for the task.

Selected Answer: A
A is answer

Selected Answer: A
For building an image tagging solution for social media that tags images of your friends automatically, you should use the Azure Cognitive Services service: Face. The Face service is specifically designed for facial recognition and can help you identify and tag images based on the faces it detects, making it suitable for recognizing and tagging your friends in images.

So, the correct choice is:

A. Face

Selected Answer: A
Computer vision only does basic face detection, the face service can identify specific individuals based on training data.

Selected Answer: A
Face is more specialized for this job.
This question appeared in Exam on 9/17/23

Selected Answer: A
Azure Cognitive Services' Face service is designed specifically for face detection and recognition tasks. It can be used to detect faces in images and identify specific individuals if they are part of your known friends' group. This service is suitable for tagging images based on facial recognition, which is a common use case in social media applications for identifying and tagging friends in photos.

So, the correct choice is A. Face.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.
The Azure Cognitive Services Face service provides facial recognition and analysis capabilities. It can detect and recognize faces in images, identify specific individuals, and analyze facial attributes such as age, gender, emotions, and more.

Microsoft Azure provides multiple cognitive services that you can use to detect and analyze faces, including:

Computer Vision, which offers face detection and some basic face analysis, such as returning the bounding box coordinates around an image.
Video Indexer, which you can use to detect and identify faces in a video.
Face, which offers pre-built algorithms that can detect, recognize, and analyze faces.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/detect-analyze-faces/2-face-analysis-azure

The Azure Cognitive Services service that you should use to build an image tagging solution for social media that tags images of your friends automatically is:

A. Face

The Azure Cognitive Services Face service provides facial recognition and analysis capabilities. It can detect and recognize faces in images, identify specific individuals, and analyze facial attributes such as age, gender, emotions, and more. By training the Face service with images of your friends, you can create a custom face recognition model that will allow you to automatically tag images of your friends in social media.

The Face service provides robust and accurate face detection and recognition capabilities, making it suitable for tasks like image tagging based on specific individuals.

Select Azure Computer Vision button to open the configuration screen for this feature."

Per Microsoft Learning, Face Detection and Analysis Use Cases: "Social Media - Detect and auto-tag known friends in pictures". 

Since Face categorizes under Cognitive Solutions (along with Computer Vision), the most applicable would be the Face Service. Computer Vision would also at a high level but specificity dictates Face to be the correct answer.

Selected Answer: A
For me the given answer, Face, is correct. The goal here is to recognize the face of my friends in order to apply tag on a social media. The best service we can use to do Facial Recognition is the Face API.
A - Face API

Selected Answer: D
Question asks for a cognitive service not API

Selected Answer: D
To automatically tag images of your friends, you can use Azure Cognitive Services Computer Vision API. This API provides powerful image analysis algorithms that can recognize various objects, people, and scenes in the images. With this API, you can extract rich visual features from the images, including tags, descriptions, and categories. These features can be used to automatically tag the images with relevant keywords and descriptions, which can make it easier to search and organize the images.

Note that the Computer Vision API uses machine learning algorithms to recognize the objects and scenes in the images, and it can improve its accuracy over time as it learns from more data. Therefore, it is a great choice for building an image tagging solution that can automatically recognize and tag images of your friends.
The question is "Which Azure Cognitive Services service should you use" and not which API. The answer is Computer Vision (Cognitive Service) and not Face API (API)...

Selected Answer: A
Face API

Selected Answer: D
The Azure Cognitive Service that is best suited for building an image tagging solution for social media is Computer Vision.

Computer Vision is a service that can analyze and extract information from images, including facial recognition and tagging. With Computer Vision, you can build solutions that automatically tag and label images based on the objects, scenes, and people they contain. This makes it an ideal choice for building an image tagging solution for social media, which requires accurate and efficient tagging of friends in images.

Face Most Voted is not a valid Azure Cognitive Service, and Form Recognizer and Text Analytics are not well-suited for image tagging tasks. Therefore, the best option is Computer Vision.
